Backup

RAM

  1. Find RAM size in bytes and backup RAM to a file:

    # vmstat -s -S b | head -n 1 | grep -o '[0-9]*'
# ?

Hard Drive

  1. Unmount source disk!
  2. Find disk size in bytes and backup disk to file:

    # parted -s </dev/sdX> unit B p free
# dd if=</dev/sdX> of=<OUTPUT-FILE.dd> status=progress ; sync
